body_html: This is very similar with #20091 and it's essentially caused by the fact that the implementation of clip_by_norm requires computing the gradient w.r.t. tf.norm(t) even when |t| < clip_norm. I am not sure how this can be solved since TF uses static graphs. Would have been trivial in a framework that uses dynamic graphs ...
